page.title: 05WALKS AROUND BROADWAY
page.content: There are many varied walks in and around{Broadway.}A public footpath crosses woodland and meadows towards {Willersey Hill}and{Saintbury Church. The views are superb. It is possible to see across the{Vale of Evesham}to {Bredon Hill}and the{Malvern Hills beyond. The woods are a haven for wildlife. Badgers,foxes and grey squirrels can be seen, also grass snakes and the occasional adder. In the autumn lapwings gather in the fields. Wild flowers grow in sheltered spots - wild arums, wood sorrel, willow herb and rare orchids. Wild daffodils abound in spring. Tourists can buy a book of{Broadway}walks from the local shops. Walking is a popular weekend pastime and the area caters for the casual stroller and the long distance hiker.
